dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am the Crag Crusher, unstoppable force of the beasts. What business do you have in these lands, weakling?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking to challenge your strength. Prepare for battle, Crag Crusher!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You dare challenge me? Ha! Your bravery will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down. Let us fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal. Face the wrath of the Crag Crusher!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stand my ground and fight till the end!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your end is near, puny creature!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense defeat. I retreat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Running away like a coward? Pathetic. You will meet your fate another day.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I yield. I do not wish to fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! Weakling. Off with you then. Your presence disgusts me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you should. Be gone before my patience wears thin.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Insult me again, and I shall return stronger.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Empty threats from a coward. Leave my sight, or I shall crush you without mercy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us put our differences aside and join forces against a common enemy.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! You speak of alliances? I have no need for weak allies like you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek strength in unity. Together we can be formidable.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bah! I stand alone, mighty and invincible. Begone with your pitiful pleas.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: As you wish, I shall not disturb your solitude.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Now leave before I lose my patience.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking knowledge of these lands. Will you share your wisdom, Crag Crusher?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom? Hah! You know nothing of the true ways of the beasts. But I might entertain your curiosity for a moment.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Tell me of the beasts you command. I wish to understand their ways.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The beasts are mighty and fierce, unlike you weaklings. There is nothing for you to understand.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect their power. Teach me how to be strong like them.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength is not learned, it is born. You will never be like us.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my intrusion. Farewell, Crag Crusher.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave then, insignificant creature. Your presence annoys me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek peace and harmony in these lands. Will you help me in my quest?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace and harmony? Ha! Such ideals are foreign to the Crag Crusher. Leave before I lose my temper.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, I shall depart. May the beasts guide your path.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave now, before my patience snaps like a twig.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your anger blinds you. I will not fight you, but I will not seek your aid either.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fine by me. Be gone and never return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: As a fellow creature of magic, I offer my friendship and cooperation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Magic? Hah! Your feeble magic is nothing compared to the might of the Crag Crusher. Leave before I crush you like a pebble.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I meant no disrespect. I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Good riddance. Begone, insignificant mage.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your arrogance will be your downfall. I bid you farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogance? Ha! I fear nothing, especially not the likes of you. Leave now, before I lose my temper.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand your ways, Crag Crusher. Will you indulge my curiosity?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity? Very well, ask your questions. But do not waste my time, weakling.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: What drives the beasts you command? Is it loyalty or fear?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The beasts obey through sheer dominance. Fear is a language they understand well.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see. Thank you for your insight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Enough talking. Leave now, before I decide to make you my next meal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your methods may bring fear, but they will not earn you respect.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? I need none from the likes of you. Be gone before I show you true fear.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Do you see yourself as the ultimate ruler of these lands, or are you merely a servant to a greater power?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I answer to no one. The Crag Crusher is supreme, unmatched in strength and power.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your arrogance will be your downfall. I will take my leave now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogance? I am power incarnate. Leave before I show you true strength.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: May your reign be just and bring prosperity to these lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: My reign? It will bring destruction to all who oppose me. Leave now, weakling.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Is there no room for compassion in your heart, Crag Crusher?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Compassion? Bah! That is a weakness I do not possess. Leave now before I decide to crush you like the insignificant creature you are.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave you in peace, unbothered by my questions.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: About time. Be gone, before I lose my patience.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your lack of compassion will be your undoing. Farewell, Crag Crusher.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Undoing? Ha! I fear nothing, not even your pitiful attempts. Now leave before I decide to end you.
